segments.text: The environment varies greatly because of difference in language , customs and traditions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This gap can be filled by export market research before exporting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the importance of the export research is often neglected by the managers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . They do not appreciate its value and consider it to be a luxury .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Therefore , when enterprises are spending a lot of money in trying to penetrate a new market , they should research whether their products can be sold at high enough a price and in a satisfactory amount .
segments.speaker: S1
